item.title: Deploy Debezium and Kafka on AKS using Strimzi Operator
item.description: This tutorial follows Debezium official documentation Deploying Debezium on Kubernetes, but modified for Azure Kubernetes Service and Azure Container Registry. Table of Content 1.
